title: Official Blind Review #3
review_assessment:_checking_correctness_: I assessed the sensibility of the derivations and theory.
review:
My review got deleted because the title kept creating an unexplained error.
Here's another shorter attempt

I haven't really followed along the literature for this. But from the results, it's not immediately clear to me what practical setup this is useful in. The authors assume perfect network synchrony, they have a 25% overhead on TensorFlow and they have a comparison to another algorithm that operates under different assumptions.

Who would ever use this and why? What's the plan for getting data to the untrusted workers?
